name: Declaration Of Rebellion
Text: 'Deploy on table. Bail, Leia, and Mon Mothma are Insurgents. While an Insurgent present at a battleground, your total battle destiny is +1, and, if with your non-unique character, each may forfeit for 4 when hit. Once per game, may take one K''lor''slug into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter).',
